column4: hello need help, how can i install a wireless driver in ubuntustudio? i cant get wireless this is very frustrating...
what's the hardware?
open a terminal and pastebin (paste.ubuntu.com) everything from the command `dmesg`
see above
please paste in this command too `iwconfig`
err pastebin*
thanks
okay from your terminal do this command `sudo iwconfig wlan0 essid <ESSID> enc on key s:<PASSWORD>` and replace everything in between <> with your own stuff
your driver is good
<ESSID> is your router essid name and <password> would be the WEP password
nothing should happen though
once you do that command then do this `sudo dhclient`
pastebin it so I can see please
lol, I meant the whole thing but okay
here's an easier way. You know the nm-applet on the panel?
it shows you if your connected to the internet
top right corner?
it should look like a computer I think
right click on it, and 'enable wireless'
give me a sec
in the terminal do this `sudo apt-get install network-manager-gnome`
now `nm-applet`
you don't need to
right click on it and 'enable wireless'
